snippet: In the latest Billboard chart, Madonna earns a dubious distinction with the biggest second-week sales drop for a No. 1 album in at least 21 years.
abstract: In the latest Billboard chart, Madonna earns a dubious distinction with the biggest second-week sales drop for a No. 1 album in at least 21 years.

headline.main: Minaj Dislodges Madonna From Top of Charts
headline.print_headline: Nicki Minaj Up; Madonna Way Down
